storybookjs /

      storybook---Storybook is a frontend workshop for building UI components and pages in isolation. Made for UI development, testing, and documentation.

202252197 /

      ChatGPT_JCM---GPT多模型聊天项目，GPT-4已发布，接口开放后本项目将第一时间适配。后期会一点一点的将OpenAI接口进行接入大家支持一下呗，微信群号在下方，右上角点个Star，我会一直更新下去。

mlc-ai /

      web-stable-diffusion---Bringing stable diffusion models to web browsers. Everything runs inside the browser with no server support.

brunosimon /

      folio-2019---

jtmuller5 /

      The-HustleGPT-Challenge---Building Startups with an AI Co-Founder

      carrot---这儿收集了一些免费好用的ChatGPT镜像站和其他AI站点，当前：76个站点

massgravel /

      Microsoft-Activation-Scripts---A Windows and Office activator using HWID / KMS38 / Online KMS activation methods, with a focus on open-source code and fewer antivirus detections.

THUDM /

      ChatGLM-6B---ChatGLM-6B：开源双语对话语言模型 | An Open Bilingual Dialogue Language Model

GitHubDaily /

      GitHubDaily---坚持分享 GitHub 上高质量、有趣实用的开源技术教程、开发者工具、编程网站、技术资讯。A list cool, interesting projects of GitHub.

mckaywrigley /

      chatbot-ui---A ChatGPT clone for running locally in your browser.

tatsu-lab /

      stanford_alpaca---Code and documentation to train Stanford's Alpaca models, and generate the data.

reactjs /

      react.dev---The React documentation website

dreamworksanimation /

      openmoonray---

setzer22 /

      llama-rs---Run LLaMA inference on CPU, with Rust 🦀🚀🦙

AUTOMATIC1111 /

      stable-diffusion-webui---Stable Diffusion web UI

openai /

      openai-cookbook---Examples and guides for using the OpenAI API

f /

      awesome-chatgpt-prompts---This repo includes ChatGPT prompt curation to use ChatGPT better.

THUDM /

      GLM---GLM (General Language Model)

karpathy /

      nanoGPT---The simplest, fastest repository for training/finetuning medium-sized GPTs.
